alert.note: Alert for Allen; Chase; Greenwood; Labette; Montgomery; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 3:14AM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...A wintry mix, will will quickly transition to moderate to heavy snow by Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Only a very light glaze of ice is possible during the transition from rain to snow early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Portions of Central and Southeast Kansas. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Near white out conditions are possible across southeast Kansas on Wednesday into Wednesday night, due to heavy snowfall and blowing snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero Wednesday night into Thursday morning could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Chase; Greenwood; Labette; Montgomery; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson
